Question
========

In a two-way ANOVA with two factors, there is an interaction as

Answerlist
----------

* Both factors have a significant main effect
* The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error
* The difference between two levels of one factor depends on the level of the other factor

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Both factors have a significant main effect: Incorrect
* The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error: Incorrect
* The difference between two levels of one factor depends on the level of the other factor: Correct
